topic.title: Most Recent Time Arrived In USA Observation - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:426)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:427)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="55209-1" Most Recent Time Arrived in USA (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:428)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:429)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, where its data type is TS (CONF:431)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:426)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:427)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="55209-1" Most Recent Time Arrived in USA (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:428)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:429)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, where its data type is TS (CONF:431)

p.ph: Most Recent Time Arrived In USA Observation
